Generate JAGS likelihood code for a distribution family

Source: R/family_definitions.R
jags_family_likelihood.Rd

This generic allows S3 dispatch to generate the appropriate JAGS likelihood code for any distribution family.

Usage

jags_family_likelihood(
  family,
  response,
  predictors = NULL,
  suffix = "",
  has_structure = FALSE,
  link = "identity",
  ...
)

Arguments

family

A family object (created by get_family_object or custom constructor)

response

Character string; name of the response variable

predictors

Character vector; names of predictor variables (may be NULL)

suffix

Character string; suffix for variable names (e.g., "1" for multiple responses)

has_structure

Logical; whether the model includes a structure (e.g., phylogenetic)

link

Character string; link function ("identity", "log", "logit")

...

Additional arguments passed to methods

Value

A list with:

likelihood_code

Character vector of JAGS likelihood statements

prior_code

Character vector of JAGS prior statements (or NULL)

data_requirements

Character vector of required data elements (or NULL)
